title: Entity Extractor
description: Extract entities from data records/rows based on predefined entity categories.

dataset.title: Dataset
dataset.description: Dataset containing the data records to process. Either an Apify dataset ID or a URL to a parquet file.

model.title: LLM Model
model.description: The LLM provider and model to be used for entity extraction. Format: provider/model (e.g., 'openai/gpt-4', 'anthropic/claude-3-sonnet')

attrs.title: Record Attributes
attrs.description: List of record attributes/columns to use for entity extraction. If null, all attributes are used. This allows focusing on specific fields in your data.

entities.title: Entity Categories
entities.description: A mapping of entity category names to their descriptions. The model will extract entities belonging to these categories from the provided record attributes.
